name: Playroom Panic
description:
WHAT'S NEW(since the last update):

  • Added some shading to the characters!
  • Added a new character, Baldwin, the dumb bear!

Join a variety of colorful characters in a platformer game... OF HELL! Dodge and fight your way through missiles, a flashlight, and even your friend's OWN FEET! Play as cute and colorful characters! Play co-op with your friends... ON THE SAME KEYBOARD! What are you freaking waiting for? Join the panic today!
